item.title: Marleen add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "It is never too late to be what you might have been." -- George Eliot

item.title: Marleen add a quote by John Green
item.description:
"Have you really read all those books in your room?”
Alaska laughing- “Oh God no. I’ve maybe read a third of ‘em. But I’m going to read them all. I call it my Life’s Library. Every summer since I was little, I’ve gone to garage sales and bought all the books that looked interesting. So I always have something to read." -- John Green

item.title: Marleen add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I try to live life so that I can live with myself." -- John Green

item.title: Marleen add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You don't remember what happened. What you remember becomes what happened." -- John Green

item.title: Marleen add a quote by John Green
item.description: "When I look at my room, I see a girl who loves books." -- John Green

item.title: Marleen add a quote by John Green
item.description: "The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive." -- John Green

item.title: Marleen add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Books are the ultimate Dumpees: put them down and they’ll wait for you forever; pay attention to them and they always love you back." -- John Green

item.title: Marleen add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Marleen add a quote by Anna Bayes
item.description: "People who label erotica writers as sluts/men-whores remind me of the mob that once condemned smart women as witches. Mankind has not evolved much." -- Anna Bayes
